FuncDef: The display isis brief command displays brief information about IS-IS processes. The display isis brief command displays brief information about IS-IS processes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IS-IS process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays brief information about IS-IS processes in a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
